metadata.title: CVE-2022-48669 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/pseries: Fix potential memleak in papr_get_attr()`buf` is allocated in papr_get_attr(), and krealloc() of `buf`could fail. We need to free the original `buf` in the case of failure.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
